headline: This free online course is a step-by-step guide for those wanting to grow their career in the acting profession.
description: Acting in a film or on TV is a gratifying and rewarding career. This course provides a beginner's guide in understanding the acting process, starting a career and finding work. We help you position yourself for success and provide information to assist you in exploring the main areas to address in-depth. We start with building a resume and the actions to follow. Then we answer questions such as: 'What is UCP?' or 'How can you start a career?'.

courseDescription:
Creating and beginning a career in acting for films or TV is daunting. This course provides information on how to find work in this profession, how movies are cast and demonstrates the working principles if you are just starting out. This course explains and defines how to position yourself for success by understanding how to shine like a star. We will help you analyse how to perfect your craft and refine your product by polishing up your resume and creating the ideal headshot. We provide the answers to questions related to your ‘Unique Character Proposition’ (UCP) and discuss the acting toolbox and its various tools.

Following this, we will prepare you to study your tools and how to utilise them. First, explore how to create and use your website for your acting career correctly. Next, you will discover how to create a proper audition and prepare your work with your toolbox. We then research how to market your acting business successfully. How can you start an acting trade? What tools will help you perfect your acting craft? How can you market your acting career? This course will clarify these questions and help you on your way to success. 

Finally, we will supply you with all the skills and techniques required to start and flourish as an actor. The course provides accurate and specific information you can use to grow your acting craft. It touches on the fundamental steps to begin your career and is ideal for those starting in the profession or someone who wants to learn progressive techniques. Register for this course and become knowledgeable and excited about beginning your career in the acting business.
